Antonette gets $ 70\%$ on a 10-problem test, $ 80\%$ on a 20-problem test and $ 90\%$ on a 30-problem test. If the three tests are combined into one 60-problem test, which percent is closest to her overall score?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 40 \qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 77 \qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 80 \qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 83 \qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 87$
